mn29:17.10: So tāya samādhisampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:17.11: So tāya samādhisampadāya na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:17.12: So tāya samādhisampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati, appamatto samāno ñāṇadassanaṃ ārādheti.
mn29:17.13: So tena ñāṇadassanena attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:17.14: So tena ñāṇadassanena na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:17.15: So tena ñāṇadassanena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati, appamatto samāno asamayavimokkhaṃ ārādheti.
mn29:17.16: Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ so bhikkhu tāya asamayavimuttiyā parihāyetha.
mn29:18.1: Iti kho, bhikkhave, nayidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ lābhasakkārasilokānisaṃsaṃ, na sīlasampadānisaṃsaṃ, na samādhisampadānisaṃsaṃ, na ñāṇadassanānisaṃsaṃ.
mn29:18.2: Yā ca kho ayaṃ, bhikkhave, akuppā cetovimutti—
mn29:18.3: etadatthamidaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ, etaṃ sāraṃ etaṃ pariyosānan”ti.
mn29:19.2: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
